title: Gakkou e Ikenai Boku to 9-nin no Sensei
original_name: 学校へ行けない僕と 9 人の先生
sinopse: The young Masatomo is a normal schoolboy, but during his first year of primary school he got slapped by his teacher. After that, he loses confidence and is unable to go back to school. His parents then hire several teachers to teach him at home.
